1.content:
Alex woke up and looked over to his alarm clock.
         "12:30...i slept in..." as he stopped talking his stomach began.
         "Oh...i slept past breakfast...and no dinner last night...i gotta have something...or someone big..." he grabbed his cell phone and poured through his contacts:
         "who should i ask to help me get some food?" he looked at the several contacts that were in the secret Cannibal Society that he had started:
David Fillins: Blonde hair, Hazel eyes, Pale skin, Average Height
Eric Dane: Brown eyes, Short Brown hair, tall ,he is a jock
Josh Merit: Blonde hair, blue eyes, considered Handsome
         "Who to ask...i need some help picking out and cooking the guy...but who?"
1.title: In the Beginning

11.content:
was his first choice, but how was he supposed to get him captured. He lived across the street and spent numerous hours on video games. Alex remembered David never like spending time outside hence the pale skin, but he did love the one time he spent the weekend and saw David coming out of the bathroom wearing only his boxers. His body was very muscular and he had big feet.
Alex texted David and asked him if could come over and help him with something in the basement. David texted back that he would be over as soon as he finished taking a shower. Alex thought to himself that at least David would be clean. A few moments passed and David knocked at Alex's basement door. Alex answered wearing a lab coat and slippers on his feet. He asked David to take off his shoes before entering, but David declined saying his feet were cold. Alex adjusted the thermostat and asked David to make himself comfortable. As David sat down in a recliner, Alex helped recline the chair making David's legs and feet come up. David leans back and closes his eyes.
Suddenly, David is immobilized, unable to move any part of his body and is unable to speak. Alex stoops down and unties David's shoes and pulls them off. David's eyes widen as he wiggles his socked covered toes hoping that Alex won't go any further. Alex does however, using scissors to cut David's pants and shirt off him leaving him only in his boxers and socks. His muscular hairless chest and well formed abs tantalize Alex as he tugs off David's socks revealing his big bare feet. Alex says seductively that those big toes of David's look good as an appetizer. David winces as Alex engulfs both of his big toes into his mouth and begins to nibble on them. David passes out from the feeling and when he recovers, his now naked body is in a large pot of hot water. Still unable to move, David spots other body parts hanging by hooks on the wall. Alex takes a large pipe to push David's head down under the water. A faint scream is heard as it is covered with a large lid and secured.
A while later, Alex pulls David's lifeless body from the water and begin to cut it up. David's head is cut off first then his arms and legs. Alex cuts off David's toes and shoves them into his mouth. He looks...
11.title: David Fillins the Cool Kid

12.content:
"Hey dude" Answered Eric as he picked up his phone. Alex heard the sound of running water, Eric was probably going to take a shower or something.

         "Hey, mind taking me out, later and help me pick a big brunch?" Alex asked as he stood up from his bed and looked at himself in the mirror.

         "Yeah, sure. Pick you around 1?" Replied Eric.

         "Sure. Oh and bring me some of that Texas hot sauce you brought with you the other day" Alex answered as he hang up.

         Time went fast from 12 to 1 in Alex's mind, he got dressed, with a black t-shirt with an imprint of a skull and bones as blood splashed around the skull and regular blue jeans. It was exactly 1 on the wall clock, a knock on the door surprised him from his comfy sitting position in the living room couch, "Mom, I'm going out for a while" Alex shouted as he ran to the front door. "Be back for your therapy session at six" his mom replied.

         Once he got out, he grabbed Eric by the wrist and dragged him back to his car, there Alex sat with an upset and hungry stomach, "Woah, I didn't know you were THAT hungry" Eric teased. "Just drive already!" Alex shouted as his stomach grumbled louder. Eric turned to Alex and asked, "Where to?"
12.title: Eric Dane the Jock

13.content:
Alex called Josh.
"Hey man, i need your help."
"Why, wazzup?"
"I want you to help me pick somebody to cook. And some help cookin him. You down to it?"
13.title: Josh Merit the Cutie

info.brief_description: A bunch of teen boys go out and find and eat other boys
info.description:
There are a group of teen boys who formed a club where they go out and find people to cook and eat...
Constant Characters:
Alex: Black Hair, Blue Eyes, Tall, Pale Skin, he is fashionable for a guy
David: Blonde, Hazel eyes, Pale, Average Height, he likes
Eric: Brown eyes, Short Brown hair, tall ,he is a jock
Josh: Blonde, blue eyes, Very Handsome

Ways to cook people:
Stew
Rotisserie / Spit rast
BBQ
Suckling (Hogtied with apple in mouth)
